hero.title: Divine Blessings
hero.subtitle: Angalaparameshwari Trust
hero.description: Welcome to our sacred spiritual haven, where divine blessings flow eternally. Experience the profound peace and spiritual awakening through our temple's ancient traditions.

about.title: Sacred History
about.description: Our spiritual journey began decades ago with a divine vision to create a sacred space where devotees can experience the eternal presence of Angalaparameshwari.

foundation.title: Divine Foundation
foundation.description: Established with the blessings of revered saints and spiritual masters, our trust embodies the ancient wisdom of Hindu traditions.

mission.title: Sacred Mission
mission.description: To preserve and propagate the divine teachings while providing spiritual solace to all devotees seeking enlightenment.

service.title: Community Service
service.description: Through various seva programs, we serve humanity and spread the message of love, compassion, and spiritual unity.

gallery.title: Divine Darshan
gallery.description: Immerse yourself in the divine beauty of our sacred spaces and witness the celestial presence that graces our temple.

events.title: Sacred Events
events.description: Join us in celebrating the divine festivals and spiritual gatherings that illuminate our path to enlightenment.

donate.title: Sacred Seva
donate.description: Your generous contributions help us maintain our sacred spaces and continue our spiritual mission of serving humanity.

contact.title: Divine Connection
contact.description: Connect with us for spiritual guidance, temple services, or to join our divine community.

form.title: Send Your Prayer Request
form.name: Name
form.prayerPlaceholder: Share your prayer request or message...

footer.description: A sacred space dedicated to spiritual growth, divine blessings, and serving humanity through ancient Hindu traditions.
footer.followUs: Follow us for daily spiritual updates and temple announcements.
